alternative_parents.description: Inorganic compounds in which the largest metallic oxoanion is arsenate, to which either no atom or a non metal atom is bonded.
alternative_parents.name: Miscellaneous arsenates

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic salts of antimony. They usually contain antimony in its ionic form.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic antimony salts

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic halogenic compounds in which the heaviest metal atom is a metalloid.
alternative_parents.name: Metalloid salts

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic chemical compounds with one or more oxygen atoms combined with another element.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic compounds containing the arsenic atom.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic arsenic compounds

class.description: Inorganic oxoanionic compounds in which the heaviest atom not in an oxoanion is a metalloid.
class.name: Metalloid oxoanionic compounds

description: This compound belongs to the class of inorganic compounds known as metalloid arsenates. These are inorganic compounds in which the largest oxoanion is arsenate, and in which the heaviest atom not in an oxoanion is a post-transition metal.

direct_parent.description: Inorganic compounds in which the largest oxoanion is arsenate, and in which the heaviest atom not in an oxoanion is a post-transition metal.
direct_parent.name: Metalloid arsenates

kingdom.description: Compounds that do not contain a C atom. Exceptions are made for isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon trioxide, carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Inorganic compounds

subclass.description: Inorganic compounds in which the largest oxoanion is arsenate, and in which the heaviest atom not in an oxoanion is a post-transition metal.
subclass.name: Metalloid arsenates

superclass.description: Compounds that contains both metal and non metal atoms.
superclass.name: Mixed metal/non-metal compounds
